column1: # COMPREHENSIVE E2E TEST SCENARIOS - HRM SYSTEM
# Excel-formatted test cases for all API endpoints and business scenarios

column7: Valid employee data creates new employee
Invalid phone format must be rejected
Missing required fields must be rejected
Authenticated users can retrieve employee list

column5: Valid employee ID and bearer token
column7: Valid employee ID returns employee data

column5: Invalid employee ID and bearer token

column5: Valid employee ID and bearer token

column7: Valid department data creates new department
Duplicate department names should be rejected
Cannot delete department with active employees
Authenticated users can retrieve salary structures
Valid salary structure creates new record
Invalid employee ID must be rejected
Valid salary structure can be updated
Employee salary structure can be retrieved
Valid user data creates new account
User roles can be updated by admin
Valid project data creates new project
Cannot delete project with active timesheets

Valid employee payroll can be calculated
Authenticated users can retrieve payroll records
Cannot calculate payroll without salary structure
